messages.root: Choose the setting you would like to modify
messages.language:
Select preferred language, by default it's inferred from the device locale.

Current: *%s* (`%s`)
messages.defaultCurrency:
Select the default currency to be used in case no other currencies specified within an expression. Full currency list depends on chosen API (%s), see /apis.

Current default currency: *%s*
messages.defaultApi:
Select currency rate API to be used by default, see /apis for more info.

Current API: *%s* (`%s`)
Unavailable currencies: %s
messages.outputCurrencies:
Select default output currency list, if the currency already in the list, it would be removed on button click. Currency list depends on chosen API (%s), see /apis.

*Current currencies:
* %s
messages.dashboardCurrencies:
Select currency list to choose between in order to show all available rates in case of empty inline query, if the currency already in the list, it would be removed on button click. Currency list depends on chosen API (%s), see /apis.

*Current currencies:*
 %s
messages.decimalDigits:
Select a number of digits after decimal point to show in results. 

Current value: *%d* (`%s`)
messages.thousandSeparator:
Select a symbol to separate thousands for large numbers. 

Currently printed like this: `%s`
messages.alerts:
You currently have *%d* alerts set up.

To set up a new alert. New alerts can be added via /alert\_delta or /alert\_rate commands (see /help). 

⚠️ By clicking on the alert button it will be permanently deleted.
